backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Help me understand where I am spending my time and identify ways I can reclaim time to focus more on my top priorities.

gutts.name: Retrieve Calendar Events
gutts.capability: Access and fetch all scheduled calendar events within the relevant timeframe
gutts.user_goal: Obtain a complete dataset of the user's time allocations
gutts.evidence: Implementation calls Google/Microsoft Calendar API to pull event data

gutts.name: Extract Event Attributes
gutts.capability: Parse and normalize event details such as duration, participants, and category
gutts.user_goal: Ensure all event data is structured for analysis
gutts.evidence: Transforms raw calendar JSON into structured objects with standardized fields

gutts.name: Classify Events by Category
gutts.capability: Assign each event to a category (e.g., meeting, focus work, personal) using rules or ML
gutts.user_goal: Understand the nature of time spent across different activity types
gutts.evidence: Uses ML model or keyword-based rules to label events as 'meeting', 'admin', etc.

gutts.name: Identify Priority Alignment
gutts.capability: Determine whether each event aligns with the user’s stated top priorities
gutts.user_goal: Evaluate which activities support the user’s goals
gutts.evidence: Compares event descriptions against user-defined priority keywords or goals

gutts.name: Compute Time Allocation Metrics
gutts.capability: Aggregate event durations by category and priority alignment
gutts.user_goal: Quantify how time is distributed across different activities
gutts.evidence: Generates summary metrics such as total hours in meetings vs. focus work

gutts.name: Detect Low-Value or Non-Priority Blocks
gutts.capability: Identify events that consume time but do not align with top priorities
gutts.evidence: Produces a list of events marked as low-priority or non-essential

gutts.name: Generate Time Reclaim Recommendations
gutts.capability: Suggest actionable strategies to free up time (e.g., decline, shorten, delegate)
gutts.user_goal: Receive practical steps to focus more on top priorities
gutts.evidence: Outputs recommendations like 'Shorten weekly sync to 30 mins' or 'Decline optional meeting'

gutts.name: Present Insights and Recommendations
gutts.capability: Visualize time distribution and display suggested actions in an understandable format
gutts.user_goal: Clearly understand current time usage and next steps
gutts.evidence: Generates charts and a summary dashboard with actionable insights
